text: Karyugino () is a rural locality (a village) in Krasnoyarsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 16 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 28 km from Ufa, 3 km from Krasny Yar. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Karyugino
